short_summary: Seeking proposals for the procurement of Run Flat 20X tires, part number VF-0018, for the Canadian Armed Forces.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the procurement of Run Flat 20X tires. The delivery is requested at 25 CFSD Montreal and 7 CFSD Edmonton by June 29, 2023. Item 1, GSIN: 2640, NSN: 01-548-7250. Run Flat 20X Part No.: VF-0018NSCM/CAGE: 62161. Quantity: 500. Unit of Issue: EA. To be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec. Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NSCM/CAGE they are offering.
full_summary:
================================
### Title - titre
MSVS Run Flats

### Reference Number 
PW-23-01023515

### Solicitation Number
W8486-238987/A

### Tender Details
* **GSIN**: JX2640
* **UNSPSC**: None
* **Description**: Tire rebuilding and tire and tube repair materials - Repair
* **Delivery Locations**:
	+ 25 CFSD Montreal (Quebec, except NCR)
	+ 7 CFSD Edmonton
* **Delivery Deadline**: June 29, 2023

### Procurement Information
* **Procurement Category**: SRVTGD
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Eligibility
This procurement is open to all qualified suppliers, regardless of nationality.

### Submission Information
* **Submission Method**: Electronic receipt of bids by e-mail only
* **Submission Address**: DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca

### Additional Information
* **Language of Submission**: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* **Debriefings**: Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process. Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within fifteen (15) working days from receipt of the results of the bid solicitation process.
* **Timeline**: The tender closing date is March 8, 2023, at 14:00.

### Contact Information
Tanya Mckenzie

 Ministry of National Defence

101 Colonel By Drive
Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2
tanya.mckenzie@forces.gc.ca

### Attachments
The tender package is available on the Government of Canada Buy and Sell website.

Please note that I removed redundant and insufficiently detailed information from the original text. If you know
